scripts.start:web: yarn run build-custom-build-scripts && yarn run cp-sim-wasm-assets && env-cmd -e dev-web --use-shell "ng serve -c dev-web"
scripts.start:electron: yarn run build-custom-build-scripts && env-cmd -e dev-electron --use-shell "electron-rebuild && npm-run-all -p ng:serve:electron electron:serve"
scripts.build:web: yarn run build-custom-build-scripts && yarn run cp-sim-wasm-assets && env-cmd -e prod-web --use-shell "ng build -c prod-web " && yarn run wasm-js-cache-bust
scripts.build:electron:win: yarn run prepackage:electron && yarn run package:electron:win
scripts.build:electron:linux: yarn run prepackage:electron && yarn run package:electron:linux
scripts.build:electron:win64: yarn run prepackage:electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 x64
scripts.build:electron:win32: yarn run prepackage:electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 ia32
scripts.build:electron:win-arm64: yarn run prepackage:electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 arm64
scripts.build:electron:linux64: yarn run prepackage:electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js linux x64
scripts.build:electron:linux32: yarn run prepackage:electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js linux ia32
scripts.build:electron:linux-arm64: yarn run prepackage:electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js linux arm64
scripts.prepackage:electron: yarn run build-custom-build-scripts && env-cmd -e prod-electron --use-shell "ng build -c prod-electron && yarn run electron:tsc && node custom-build-scripts/dist/create-dist-package.js && yarn run electron-npm-i"
scripts.package:electron:win: node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 x64 && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 ia32 && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 arm64
scripts.package:electron:linux: node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js linux x64 && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js linux ia32 && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js linux arm64
scripts.electron:serve: wait-on http-get://localhost:8202/ && yarn run electron:tsc && electron . --inspect=5858
scripts.electron:debug: yarn run build-custom-build-scripts && env-cmd -e dev-electron --use-shell "electron-rebuild --debug --force && yarn run ng:serve:electron"

developmentInfo: For Development you should use the local version of shared-cops to use live reload from the libary
